article_title: Kentucky’s economic forecast looks brighter, with some clouds
article_text: Tom Eblen is a columnist for the Lexington Herald-Leader who writes about life, people and issues in Lexington and Kentucky. A Lexington native, Eblen was the Herald-Leader's managing editor from 1998 to 2008.

article_metadata.news-keywords: tom, eblen, economy, business, manufacturing, horses, lexington, louisville, wage, minimum, toyota, lexus, centrepointe, city
article_metadata.description: Kentucky enters a new economic year with a lot of hope and some caution.
